net.sandius.rembulan.runtime

Class RuntimeCallInitialiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sandius.rembulan.runtime.RuntimeCallInitialiser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CallInitialiser

    public class RuntimeCallInitialiser
extends Object
implements CallInitialiser
    The default implementation of a call initialiser.

    This class serves as a bridge between call executors defined in the package net.sandius.rembulan.exec and the runtime implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RuntimeCallInitialiser forState(StateContext stateContext)
      Returns a new call initialiser for calls executed in the specified state context stateContext, and using the default return buffer factory (see ReturnBuffers.defaultFactory()).
      static RuntimeCallInitialiser forState(StateContext stateContext, ReturnBufferFactory returnBufferFactory)
      Returns a new call initialiser for calls executed in the specified state context stateContext that use return buffers initialised by the specified factory returnBufferFactory.
      Continuation newCall(Object fn, Object... args)
      Returns the Lua call fn(args...) reified as a continuation.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • forState

        public static RuntimeCallInitialiser forState(StateContext stateContext,
                                              ReturnBufferFactory returnBufferFactory)
        Returns a new call initialiser for calls executed in the specified state context stateContext that use return buffers initialised by the specified factory returnBufferFactory.
        Parameters:
        stateContext - the state context, must not be null
        returnBufferFactory - the return buffer factory, must not be null
        Returns:
        a new call initialiser for stateContext
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if stateContext or returnBufferFactory is null

      • forState

        public static RuntimeCallInitialiser forState(StateContext stateContext)
        Returns a new call initialiser for calls executed in the specified state context stateContext, and using the default return buffer factory (see ReturnBuffers.defaultFactory()).
        Parameters:
        stateContext - the state context, must not be null
        Returns:
        a new call initialiser for stateContext
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if stateContext is null

      • newCall

        public Continuation newCall(Object fn,
                            Object... args)
        Description copied from interface: CallInitialiser
        Returns the Lua call fn(args...) reified as a continuation.
        Specified by:
        newCall in interface CallInitialiser
        Parameters:
        fn - the call target, may be null
        args - call arguments, must not be null
        Returns:
        a continuation representing the call fn(args...)
